objects.specification: A large flat floor plane spanning the entire room, with a smooth vinyl-like surface finished in a light neutral tone. The floor has a subtle texture for grip and a low-sheen finish to diffuse glare under the overhead lighting.

A broad ceiling panel spanning the room’s footprint, with a smooth plaster surface painted pure white. The ceiling is flat and unadorned except for recessed light fixtures, providing a clean contemporary look.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish painted in a warm earthy tone, featuring a subtle repeating dinosaur pattern motif across the surface for a thematic accent.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish painted in a warm earthy tone, featuring a subtle repeating dinosaur pattern motif across the surface for a thematic accent.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish painted in a warm earthy tone, featuring a subtle repeating dinosaur pattern motif across the surface for a thematic accent.
A vertical wall panel with smooth plaster finish painted in a warm earthy tone, featuring a subtle repeating dinosaur pattern motif across the surface for a thematic accent.

A large rectangular window with a transparent glass pane framed in slim white powder-coated aluminum. The glass has a subtle tint to reduce glare. The window is flanked by floor-length curtains made of light beige linen, hung from a simple metal rod above and gently gathered at the sides.

A larger rectangular teacher’s desk approximately 1.8 meters wide and 0.8 meters deep, with a rich dark walnut wood finish and polished surface. It features beveled edges, a modesty panel on the front, and integrated cable management holes at the back.

A large rectangular wall-mounted whiteboard measuring about 3 meters wide and 1.5 meters high, with a smooth glossy white melamine surface and slim silver aluminum trim. The surface is magnetic and has an anti-glare coating for clear visibility.

An anatomically detailed dinosaur skeleton replica about 2 meters long, 1.5 meters deep, and 2 meters tall. The off-white fossilized bones are weathered and mounted on a discreet black metal stand, arranged in a dynamic posed stance.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A rectangular educational dinosaur poster printed on matte paper, approximately 0.8 meters wide and 0.6 meters high. It features vibrant color illustrations of dinosaurs with informative text and is mounted flat against the wall.

A tall five-shelf bookshelf made of solid pine wood, about 0.8 meters wide, 3 meters tall, and 0.3 meters deep. The shelves are evenly spaced and filled with colorful dinosaur-themed books. The surface is lightly stained to highlight the natural wood grain.
A round wall clock approximately 0.3 meters in diameter with a white face, black Arabic numerals, and slender black hands. It has a slim silver metal frame and a clear glass cover.
An indoor potted plant with lush broad green leaves, standing about 0.8 meters tall. The foliage emerges from a simple unglazed terracotta pot about 0.5 meters wide.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of gray plastic, approximately 0.3 meters wide and 0.4 meters high, with a smooth matte finish.
A small cylindrical waste bin made of gray plastic, approximately 0.3 meters wide and 0.4 meters high, with a smooth matte finish.

A rectangular student desk approximately 1.2 meters wide, 0.6 meters deep, and 0.75 meters high. It has a smooth oak wood grain finish with straight edges, four sturdy metal legs painted in a muted tone, and a satin varnish surface.

children.specification: A contoured school chair with a durable green plastic seat and backrest, mounted on a tubular metal frame painted matte dark green. It has four legs with protective caps.
